questionTitle: He often ________ about his expensive car.
Have you heard the news? Charles has got married ________ Sarah.
He went to bed ________ very ill.
Could you ________ me five pounds? I'll pay you back next Monday.
Doctors hope that one day a cure for cancer will ________.
My wife and I have much pleasure in ________ the invitation to your daughter's wedding.
He is a very ________ player. He practises for two hours every morning.
I had a ________, which I couldn't explain, that something terrible was going to happen.
If you're trying to lose weight, you should ________ off fatty food.
When he felt school, John decided to ________ a priest instead of studying languages.
She ________ drive to the station every day but then she suddenly decided to walk instead.
________ hard he tries, John never wins at tennis.
When he was hit on the head, he ________ consciousness.
He got a bad mark because he had ________ a lot of mistakes in his homework.
The student who ________ in his exams was expelled from the school.
The car came round the corner ________ full speed.
I dreamt ________ you last night.
Didn't he wait for me? No, he ________.
anwers: set off to a stroll alone
set off on a stroll alone
set out to a stroll alone
set down to a stroll alone

questionTitle: If I can't come back on time, Betty ________ her dinner alone.
As black as ________ = very dirty.
